name: tgcf
description: The ultimate tool to automate telegram message forwarding. To learn more visit https://github.com/aahnik/tgcf/wiki/Deploy-to-Heroku

API_ID.description: Put the API ID obtained from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Put the API HASH obtained from my.telegram.org

TGCF_CONFIG.description: Put the contents of tgcf.config.yml here

TGCF_MODE.description: The mode you want to run tgcf past/live

SESSION_STRING.description: After you login into your telegram account, put the session string.
